greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Row sums of triangle A027751.
comment: Essentially the same as A001065, but with a(1)=1.
Note that if n is a noncomposite number then a(n)=1.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..4096
program: (PARI) a(n) = if (n==1, 1, sigma(n) - n); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Oct 30 2017
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Nov 22 2010
